#### Lesson 4 - Lesson 4 - Of Data Cleaning and Documentation - Conquer Regular Expressions and Challenge yourself with a 'Real' Dataset

__Objective:__ At the end of this session you will be able to use regular expressions to 'clean' your data. 

_Intro to regular expressions_

- regex language
      + matching by position
      + quantifiers
      + classes
      + operators
      + escape characters
      
_Data Cleaning_

- intro to string manipulation with stringr

      + trimming whitespace
